Reviews.Title: “Great location, hospitable staff”
Reviews.Author: Faith C
Reviews.Content: cant beat location middle ton nightlife taksim square istanbul shuts pretty night city easy public transportation city 45 minute walk hostel definitely doable staff helpful suggested cheap eat poor college kids suggested actually ate twice owner upgraded dorm people extra charge clean frills didnt expectations hostel shower ok little below par fine couple days

Reviews.Title: “Central Location, very so-so rooms”
Reviews.Author: goldengaterecordings
Reviews.Content: stayed locations throughout istanbul travels turkey cant liked nice people running subpar furnishings expect noise neighborhood unexpected luckily person 2 nights

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: oli1406
Reviews.Content: chambers boheme party istanbul youre planning rest normal nights sleep dont checking hostel party animal wont bed sunrise perfect pretty secure breakfast morning delicious nice bread stay

Reviews.Title: “you can do better elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: SeattleTourist17
Reviews.Content: recently finished private roomso recently hooks walls towels clothing prints bathroom floor edging tape door towels luggage 3 flights stairs hostel spot taksim sq surrounded bars restaurants cafes surrounded bars cafes noisy night nice sitting internet service cost wasnt worth unless twenties dont mind sharing getting sleep

Reviews.Title: “Great- saved us at the last minute!”
Reviews.Author: lightbright_ld
Reviews.Content: stayed chambers 2 friends loved booked hostel time worst ive seen walked chambers hopes cancellation booked managed fit extra building night lifesaver rate hostel near beyoglu clubs bars cafes shopping owner funny helpful usually friendly people staying mention clean hear music night nearby hostel pretty quiet worth location free wifi computer lobby havas bus airport taksim 10 min walk hostel
